title: Capacity-Building Workshop for Lifelong Learning Development Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic lifelong education concepts and experience in designing learning programs within organizations
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies for current language education practitioners to design and implement lifelong learning strategies in corporate environments, implementing collaborative learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Participants can design a lifelong learning development framework linking individual learning goals with corporate strategic objectives
Participants can analyze learner needs using qualitative interview techniques and propose customized educational programs
Participants can establish sustainable development plans through collaboration with peer experts in project-based learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
